params.name: hidden_states
params.description: The final hidden states of the model.

params.name: start_states
params.description: The hidden states of the first tokens for the labeled span.

params.name: start_positions
params.description: The position of the first token for the labeled span.

params.name: p_mask
params.description: Mask for tokens at invalid position, such as query and special symbols (PAD, SEP, CLS). 1.0 means tokenshould be masked.
